column3: â€œThis is some of the best bud I've smoked in a long while. I knew after looking at the dense and gorgeous looking nugs that this was grade-A devil's lettuce, but was definitely not expecting it to bring me into rapture. The symptoms creep one by one: uplifted, euphoric, giggly respectively. I smoke weed every day and was getting tired of some of the not-so-potent bud I was inhaling, so Blue Dragon was extremely refres...â€

â€œBlue Dragon is definitely one of my favorite strains out there. If you are anything like me and have a high tolerance, this is the perfect strain for you. It doesn't take much to get the effects to hit you. It is very smooth and satisfying to take a hit of no matter if it's a joint, blunt, bowl, or bong. The effects are long lasting and fantastic. Highly recommended for an everyday smoker.â€

â€œJust tried it for the first time, literally as im writing this. The first two hits were very tasty, heavy berry and almost earthy flavors really stick with you. 
 I find it's a bit of a creeper, it kicked in a little at first, but around 5 minutes later all of my muscles relaxed, relieving some of my chronic back pain from an injury and scar tissue pain on my belly from my hysterectomy 8 months ago. This would have b...â€

â€œJust smoked this strain, wish I would've bought more since my dispensary is now out.  This is a quick hitter, and the moment it hits you nothing but happiness.  These buds are not purple like the description states.  Left me feeling worry free and energetic for hours, my wife was surprised by how much house work I spontaneously did when she got home.â€

â€œI have been smoking this for my last 3 purchases. Normally I'm the kind of guy who prefers variety to his meds, but with blue dragon, I don't even feel the need to. It's by far one of my favorite strains ever ! Long lasting, creative, euphoric, happy, awesome high. lasts for quite some time. I love this bud! GET SOME NOW!â€

â€œI'm a pretty heavy smoker, I smoke on the daily and multiple times a day. This was some good stuff, the name attracted me because I like the color blue, I only bought a joint at the shop, then smoked it with my buddy, with just that one small joint we were both good for a while. This strain has me looking for it haven't been able to find it since but it's bomb! If you're a heavy smoker and need something that'll get ...â€
â€œMy favorite strain in almost 5 years!!! Blueberry & Sour Diesel?!? Grabbed from Green River Meds in Detroit Michigan ğŸ‘ With drivethru service. Definitely will becoming back.â€

â€œAlthough not easy to find for me, blue dragon is one I stock up on when I do get a good supply.  It is rather potent, and at the same time you are able to function at a fairly high level. This is a good working bud.â€

â€œAlthough not easy to find for me, blue dragon is one I stock up on when I do get a good supply.  It is rather potent, and at the same time you are able to function at a fairly high level. This is a good working bud.â€

â€œHappy, giggly, awesome mood enhancer, with a nice little buzz that keeps you going. It's the perfect hybrid for wake and bake but....Blue Dragon packs a hell of a punch, lightweights should go easy.â€
â€œGreat stuff. Pretty hard hitting and makes music heavenly. Feels weird though, when you come down, the decline is sharp. From decent high to almost no highâ€

â€œI smashed some of this flower into rosin and it totally kicks my ass. I usually end up laughing at the dumbest shit for about a good half hour. After that, sleep can be achieved incredibly easy. Perfect last smoke of day.â€
â€œnice heady buzz. energetic and euphoric.  comes on strong yet not too strong to trigger paranoia.â€
â€œI get sooooo giggly on this strain. A joint is the perfect amount to do an activity like watch a movie or play a video game or socialize. This stuff is good even when it gets dry.â€

â€œWas told it was a favorite, boyfriend loves it.
I couldn't get past the taste and smell after it was lit. I guess blueberry/berry taste isn't for me. I'll stick with the sour strains.

The high was great though, pretty heavy for the small amount I took in.â€

â€œA very happy high, great for depression. After a single bowl in one night, I felt the effects of its stress revealing poweress. For two days my depression seemed cured, and I spent those days sober.

a much harsher than expected smoke, with a very subtle blueberry hint. It hits hard with an amazing head-rush which in turn creates a happy, talkative high.â€
â€œGreat cannabis for relaxing after a stressful or hard day. Great flavor.â€
â€œreally prominent taste, with a very strong odor, enjoy smoking joints of this bud over using a pipe, beautiful buds, crystals, and trichomes over the top.â€
â€œI get sooooo giggly on this strain. A joint is the perfect amount to do an activity like watch a movie or play a video game or socialize. This stuff is good even when it gets dry.â€
â€œnice heady buzz. energetic and euphoric.  comes on strong yet not too strong to trigger paranoia.â€

â€œWas told it was a favorite, boyfriend loves it.
I couldn't get past the taste and smell after it was lit. I guess blueberry/berry taste isn't for me. I'll stick with the sour strains.

The high was great though, pretty heavy for the small amount I took in.â€

â€œTight buds with lots of dark red hairs and clear trichomes. Grinds up to be nice and fluffy and vaporizes evenly. TONS of vapor flood my wand, filling my mouth and nose with intense berry taste and smell. My body quickly relaxes and my pain vanishes in minutes. This is definitely a new favorite.â€

â€œAlways been a sour diesel and Jack Herrera lover.. But must say that the blue dragon was such a great all inclusive smoke that I purchased more the following day just to stock up and enjoy this beautiful new strain for myselfâ€

â€œI smashed some of this flower into rosin and it totally kicks my ass. I usually end up laughing at the dumbest shit for about a good half hour. After that, sleep can be achieved incredibly easy. Perfect last smoke of day.â€

â€œAlways been a sour diesel and Jack Herrera lover.. But must say that the blue dragon was such a great all inclusive smoke that I purchased more the following day just to stock up and enjoy this beautiful new strain for myselfâ€

â€œVery smooth smoke; instant body relaxation with calming cerebral effects; full, fruity taste like cherry tobacco; great for depression, anxiety, migraines; some energy; this one's for relaxing nights out with nothing complicated.â€
â€œGood for a day at home, good luck socializing!â€

â€œNot only is the Blue Dragon tasty, it's quite potent as well.

I've been enjoying this uplifted, motivated feeling during the daytime for a week now.  I can be faded as all get out and still handle social settings smoothly.  I'd definitely give this a go if you get the chance.â€
â€œit has a strong euphoric and sedative effect. taking a hit is like breathing in the spring breeze. the purple in it is very delicious I recommend this to everyoneâ€
â€œThis strain was very potent and got me a nice high. It was dense, but when grinded turned almost soft from all the THC crystals.â€

â€œI was so tired and unable to just relax and have a good night's sleep, due to muscle cramps and pain. Blue dragon with it's fruitty undertones made me drift into blue clouds and dream a little dream. I finally got some good" sleep and woke up refreshed. Yey for Blue Dragon!â€"

â€œI thought this would be good for leg cramping, but didn't think it worked much at all in this regard.  I also noticed I got headaches from it.  Kind of a bummer.  It does last a while in a sort of comfortable daze. It wasn't as energetic as I had hoped.â€

â€œI feel as if my vision is much brighter and feel euphoric and ready for tasks.  Even though I'm about to start my weekend.  Pretty amazing in my view everything from flavor to the classic sour diesel feeling with added indica spaciness.â€

â€œNot only is the Blue Dragon tasty, it's quite potent as well.

I've been enjoying this uplifted, motivated feeling during the daytime for a week now.  I can be faded as all get out and still handle social settings smoothly.  I'd definitely give this a go if you get the chance.â€

â€œBlue Dragon to me is an example of a nearly perfect hybrid. On one inhale I'm instantaneously flooded with warm memories, and comfortable body high, yet that's juxtaposed with an uplifting cerebral presence. Filled with so much energy,I'm ecstatic and by the end of a bowl I'm positively beaming.â€

â€œI had 2 different experiences with Blue Dragon. The first time it made me extremely tired and pretty much put me on my as when some friends and I were fishing. My bell on my pole rang meaning I had a fish on and as I got up to reel it in I said to my friends I'm too stoned." Yeah. The second time I wanted to do all kinds of stuff. Like I was down for whatever. I guess it really intensifies whatever mood you're alrea...â€"

â€œBought this in a vape cartridge and it put me into this mellow laid back feel. Music was explosive. Smoked it before drumming and it put me in this tunnel focus. I was able to concentrate on different instruments every clearly. didnt really give me a creative boost but it helped for the quality of music being played. I recommend this to musician's for a more focus approach to music.â€

I recommend this to musician's for a more focus approach to music.â€

â€œDefinitely as described by others if you're a smoker with a high tolerance this is definitely a strain to try out if you can find it. The effects slowly set in one by one just leaving you all around happy and euphoric.â€

â€œSuch a good hybrid. Perfect for a wake and wake session. I felt giggly, uplifted and energized. Perfect for anxiety and depression. It also helps with migraine and aches. Id take Blue Dragon over Blue Dream. Simply because Blue dragon is a well balanced sativa dominate hybrid. Blue dream is too much for me, it worsened my anxiety. But yeah I totally recommend Blue Dragon.â€
â€œit has a strong euphoric and sedative effect. taking a hit is like breathing in the spring breeze. the purple in it is very delicious I recommend this to everyoneâ€

â€œNot really a novice weed with a strong, steady animated high that comes on pretty fast. The immediate effect coupled with a tasty terpene profile that promotes continued use can cause anyone to go overboard!! Very yummy all around. The euphoric head buzz left me creative and busy with a continued focus on each task until complete. This last part being a small miracle considering my lack of focus albeit great for my a...â€
â€œGreat stuff. Good mellow high. Gets you very high.â€
â€œSweet berry flavored Earthy strain. Relaxed feelings without painful stabbing. This strain takes away the pain associated with arthritis, joint pain, neuropathy. Tastes sour Diesel and berry.â€

â€œVery solid. No body understands the meaning of average anymore. This strain is very average which is great. I wish I could rate 1-10 because this is a solid 7. People don't appreciate how wonderful average is. You don't always have to have the number one strain to be satisfied. This strain is solid and will always give you a guaranteed fun time. If you have any doubts about blue dragon then just go for it. I promise ...â€

â€œJust woke up from smoking a J of this strain, it has more of a heavier feel to me. It was easy for me to knock out, so this wouldnt be the strain id recommend if your sensitive to inidica type or looking to be more social on.â€

â€œEating this flower and allowing it to dissolve under your tongue primarily gave me a floaty, relaxed , challenging to focus medicated feeling in about 3 minutes after eating it, At the 4 hours after consumption mark, a more focused, heady and analytical feeling comes about , at which time my neck pain creeps back in and an slight internal headspin begins.â€
â€œWell, not every strain can be a hit, unfortunately. I'm always suspecting of staff recommendations, I take it as Hey we need to get rid of this strain

column3: â€œI got so high very strong even stronger flavorâ€
â€œMy favorite, so chill and gives an uplifting mood. I use this when i do my homework. Keeps me active and overall really soothing for my comfort.â€

â€œNever heard of this beauty,ive been recuperating from oral surgery and been smoking on Grape Cookies to help me sleep and relax. This hybrid is Amazing , the Blueberry relaxes and envelops u in a warm euphoric blanket but then the Sour part stimulates ur brain to be social, happy, and present. Warning!! The more u smoke the heavier the Indica efffects kick in. 
Great for a group session tho. Have munchies ready.â€
â€œI got so high very strong even stronger flavorâ€
â€œvery nice smoke and amazing high. as soon as I opened the bag all I smelled was blueberry, very potent. would recommend to anyone!â€

â€œThis strain taught me the difference between sativa and sativa-dominant hybrids. Also made no doubt that my chronic pain responds to sativas, not indicas. The body high is concentrated around behind my eyes and like a stone in my stomach (but my stomach is quiet, no upset stomach here). Good strain, but the Sour Diesel component doesn't do much for me, I guess (or should I try Sour Diesel directly?)â€

â€œThe specimen I picked up was gorgeous , so dense cured perfectly ! So was a 5g. I love blueberry so naturally I was drawn to it, it tastes like a sour blueberry , i don't think I will find another drop of this plant and quality ever again... My precious.â€

â€œDefinitely cracked my top 10 with this. It'll stick you wherever you're at but as soon as you get moving you wanna stay moving. Great hybrid, subtle onset but powerful effects. Tingling sensations paired with heavy relaxation and buzzing makes for a great high!â€
